author: Erin Taylor
title: COVID-19 anxiety taking a toll? There’s a subreddit for that
description: There is an abundance of information about coronavirus, but r/Covid19_support exists for the gaps in emotional guidance. Reddit might not be reliable for COVID-19 information, but it could be the internet’s best support group.
content:
Reddit might not be reliable for COVID-19 information, but it could be the internets best support group
COVID-19 is all anyone can talk about in real life, which means its all anyone can talk about on the internet, which means its all anyone is discussing on… [+6087 chars]
